iQOO Z5x price is RMB 1499 (around Rs 17,600) for the 6GB + 128GB, RMB 1599 (approx Rs 18,800) for 8GB + 128GB, and RMB 1799 (around Rs 21,200) for 8GB + 256GB version. The phone will… [+1084 chars]
